description.value: A code for organisation/facility name type/qualifier.

purpose.value: A code for organisation/facility name type/qualifier.

definition.value: Any names by which the organisation/facility is known by (known as).
The previous legal name(s) of the organisation/facility.
The Māori name of the organisation/facility.
The legal name of the organisation/facility as recorded by in the NZ Register of Companies. There is only one active Registered name at any one time. Effective dates for names are recorded.
An abbreviated name by which the organisation/facility is known.
Used when the organisation/facility has a separate trading name.
The name currently used for a facility.
